title.rendered: Modelling Tools/Cutter/Embosser | Set of 9 Tools with 18 Heads

content.rendered: Fondant cake decorations are beautiful and equally easy when you have the right tools. The Fondant Tool Set contains nine tools with two different ends that will assist you with varied tasks like cutting, sculpting, creating and placing decorative materials and more. These double ended tools are perfect for detailing your Fondant and gum paste. These tools are made of durable plastic with rubberized handles to give you a superior grip and comfort while creating the art piece for your cake. The set of nine tools consists of: Ball Tool, Rolling wheel Tool, Knife, Needle and many more.

excerpt.rendered:
A set of 9 pieces double ended tools for different shapes. Multifunctional professional tool for making fondant cakes and flower paste.

Safe Material: The head of fondant tools is made of durable ABS material, and the handle is made of PP material.

Removable Pen Tip:Each stroke can be disassembled and assembled at will, so that you can more conveniently engrave various shapes, such as petals, leaves, balls, lace, etc.Use to form, shape, mark, and imprint sugar paste flowers, leaves, figures and other decoration.

Multifunction Modelling Tool set can be used for cake carving, fondant modeling, chocolate carving, sugarcraft modelling, handmade soap carving, etc. Icing and Modelling Tools for beginners and professionals.
